entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
